text:
No Opiates 
No #Cannabis 
NO help from America First 
I went and asked for Script of 3 pills to replace 3 I used during a Back Spasm ~ 
My Nurse Practitioner said "I can send you to a Pain Clinic" 
I replied "I used Cannabis for #Cancer a Pain doctor won't give me 3 Pills" https://t.co/8nT0SQwcHZ
